content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 3, Swansea City 1.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 3, Swansea City 1.
Attempt missed. Leroy Fer (Swansea City) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Ryan Shawcross.
Substitution, Stoke City. Peter Crouch replaces Marko Arnautovic.
Substitution, Swansea City. Jack Cork replaces Ki Sung-yueng.
